newsitem.title: ISRAEL: Logal brings products to the Internet.
newsitem.headline: Logal brings products to the Internet.

text.p: Logal Educational Software & Systems Ltd has implemented the first of its interactive educational products on the Internet, a company spokesman said.
The product, called Function Investigator, is one of Logal's 27 high school science and math products.
The Israeli company said the Internet will expand its market.
"We have constructed a new model to bring all our software products to the Internet with full activity," Logal chief executive Yoel Givol said in a statement.

He said the new model enabled the company to cut about a year from its Internet implementation schedule and means that the full product line should be available on the Internet by the beginning of 1997.
